review: Great device. Interface not as "sleek and shiny" as the Apple TV, but if you use a lot of Prime Video and the included cloud backup for pictures with your Prime account, its the way to go. That content is available in an instant when you get home from family events. The "apps" way of having you access other servivces like Netflix, HBO Go, etc is not as user freindly as i expected compared to the Apple TV that I have. Other than that, its a no-brainer.
